text: 'Excellent ice cream - that goes without saying. But there is a sign posted on the front door stating that masks are mandatory ‚Äî yet the store was full

text: 'I am a pregnant women so when I crave something I want it. I go on Doordash craving chocolate chip cookies I see this store was selling them cool. The instructions on the tab said to call ahead to order on the phone so they‚Äôre freshly made

Why bother writing instructions for the customer  to call ahead for fresh cookies if you‚Äôre not gonna keep your end of the bargain.'

author: Tod Buchanan
text: 'Ben & Jerry\'s in Hoboken is the best!  Always friendly people waiting on you and fresh Ice Cream. Prior to the pandemic
column5: I also used the Ben & Jerry\'s Ice Cream Truck to go and deliver Ice Cream
column7: and Sundaes to some of my best clients as a way to say
column8: "Thank you for your business!"  What a big hit it was
column9: and great way to stay in touch with your clients over the summer. And
column10: what is better on a hot summer day than Ben & Jerry\'s Ice Cream personally delivered to your door! I look forward to the day we can all do this again. Stay safe.'

text: "Rude Manager. I tried to use my Ben & Jerry's gift card at Ben & Jerry's and they told me they weren't accepting gift cards.  I had to borrow money because I had already ordered.  Later
column5: when my Mom went to figure out what the problem was the manager said the gift card machine was broken and he didn't know when it was getting fixed.  He didn't care that we had bought the gift card there.\n\nUPDATE- Decided to give Ben & Jerry's another try- one month later this Ben & Jerry's still does not accept its own gift card.  No explanation.  No sign.  it is mid summer.  This does not appear to be a good faith effort to fix a problem."

text: 'It was very good. Me and my family wanted some ice cream and it turned out excellent! The service was amazing the employee kept asking us how the ice cream was and willing to start conversation. This deserves a ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê star rating. I will definitely be coming back in the future.'

text: "Seriously disappointed with the service here. Undertrained employee who doesn't know what to do and is not even that busy. Plus she was very rude. To the point where others around me paused to stop and stare. Not going back."

author: Emmanuel Garcia
text: "The ice cream here is as tasty as you'd expect ice cream to be and the same goes for the milkshakes and presumably everything in between. However
column5: the prices are a little bit above average for what they have to offer

author: Christina Colon
text: 'After my 5 year old daughter dropped her ice cream in the store
column5: on the counter while one of the workers was making our 3rd cone
column6: my daughter began to cry. After consoling her and making her aware it\'s ok accidents happen
column7: we just have to be more careful next time. One of your workers made her a cup of the same ice after telling me sorbet shouldn\'t have been as the 1st scoop because it melts faster. I thought it my head ok that\'s nice but you might want to make your staff aware of this. As she checked me out she said " just to make you aware
column8: I\'m going to have to charge you for that and point to the fallen ice cream. In response
column9: I stated "no you will not".\n\nThe audacity of you to even think of charging me for fallen ice cream from which was an accident from my child
column10: after seeing me console her and then make a cup to replace it. And also admitting the person who made it
column11:
made it wrong with putting sorbet on the bottom!

Shame on you!

A simple happy trip to grab ice cream turned into a lesson in which I had to explain to my daughter which got upset once again after leaving Ben & Jerry's.'

text: "This location has consistently provided great service. Issue is more with Ben & Jerry's poor  decisions to discontinue really good flavors of their ice cream. column5: with no luck. So we decided to take the 30 minute ride to the actual store because we just knew we would satisfy the craving. Well not only did we strike out on that
column6: for the employee to check the list of discontinued flavors and this flavor made the list is very disheartening!! Now because there's no reason for my wife to purchase anything Ben & Jerry's
